headline.main: Fear for "Private Property"; U.S. SHIP SEIZURES PROTESTED BY AXIS

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, March 31 -- The United States seizure of German, Italian and Danish ships was declared by German spokesmen to place the whole question of private property in jeopardy. It was asserted that German ships in United States ports were just as much the private property of German citizens as, for example, houses owned in Germany by United States nationals were their property.
